description:
Google's Panda and Penguin algorithms have affected the rankings of hundreds of thousands of websites. If you put up content on your website you are affected by Panda and Penguin to some extent whether you know it or not.

This course will show you what Panda and Penguin are all about, and what you can do to protect yourself from these two updates.

You will also learn how to analyze websites to find out whether they are affected by Panda and Penguin, and how to analyze backlinks to find out if they are toxic.
title: Learn How To Recover From Google Panda and Penguin - SEO Fix
